message.body: no luck so far in the Baltimore job market. how are things in Philly?
Hi! I'm looking into opening up my own space actually, so let's Skype/talk soon.
Yes, let's do that. I'm good. moving into a studio next month. photographing some new paintings on Monday. how are you?
I'm well. I may be curating the second floor of Vetri but I'm negotiating :/ I'm in upstate NY now.
Dia: beacon wanted to interview me for the bookstore, but I didn't against moving up there.. what's Vetri? gallery?
Oh that's funny because we were just talking about going to Dia beacon ! I am about an hour away

No. It is a very exclusive restaurant and they are opening a second floor where they will only serve drinks and rotate art and have receptions. I want 30% of all sales, and now they are waffling. We will see.
I love Dia beacon. It was the place I first saw Blinky Palermo's work in person
Thank you. My friend just texted me to say he's buying a gallery in Annapolis so if that turns into job opportunities, I will let you know
